verses.verse: And <S%H559>say<s%> unto it, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> O <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> thee, and I will stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thee, and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> thee most <S%H8077>desolate.<s%> <S%H4923><s%>

I will <S%H7760>lay<s%> thy <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H2723>waste,<s%> and <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Because <S%H3282><s%> thou hast <S%H1961>had<s%> a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H342>hatred,<s%> and hast <S%H5064>shed<s%> the blood <S%H853>of<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H3027>force<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity,<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> that their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> had an end: <S%H7093><s%>

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> as <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> I will <S%H6213>prepare<s%> thee unto <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall <S%H7291>pursue<s%> thee: <S%H518>sith<s%> thou hast <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> even <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall <S%H7291>pursue<s%> thee.

Thus will I <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%> most <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> <S%H8077><s%> and cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> it him that passeth <S%H5674>out<s%> and him that <S%H7725>returneth.<s%>

And I will <S%H4390>fill<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H2022>mountains<s%> with his <S%H2491>slain<s%> men: in thy <S%H1389>hills,<s%> and in thy <S%H1516>valleys,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H650>rivers,<s%> shall they <S%H5307>fall<s%> that are <S%H2491>slain<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

I will <S%H5414>make<s%> thee <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H8077>desolations,<s%> and thy <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3427>return:<s%> and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Because <S%H3282><s%> thou hast <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H853><s%> These <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and these <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H776>countries<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> mine, and we will <S%H3423>possess<s%> it; whereas the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> there: <S%H8033><s%>

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> as <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> I will even <S%H6213>do<s%> according to thine <S%H639>anger,<s%> and according to thine <S%H7068>envy<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H6213>used<s%> out of thy <S%H4480>hatred<s%> <S%H8135><s%> against them; and I will make myself <S%H3045>known<s%> among them, <S%H834>when<s%> I have <S%H8199>judged<s%> thee.

And thou shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and that I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H5007>blasphemies<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H559>spoken<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> They are laid <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> they are <S%H5414>given<s%> us to <S%H402>consume.<s%>

Thus with your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> ye have <S%H1431>boasted<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, and have <S%H6280>multiplied<s%> your <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me: <S%H589>I<s%> have <S%H8085>heard<s%> them.
Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> When the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8055>rejoiceth,<s%> I will <S%H6213>make<s%> thee <S%H8077>desolate.<s%>

As thou didst <S%H8057>rejoice<s%> at the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> it was <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> will I <S%H6213>do<s%> unto thee: thou shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> O <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H123>Idumea,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> of it: and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
